statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ -6 \\ 12 \\ 10 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 15 \\ -12 \\ 6 \\ 8 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 20 \\ -15 \\ 15 \\ 15 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -46 \\ 39 \\ -3 \\ -15 \\ 6 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
